hints.content:
$428 +{\goldE{?}}= 993$

![A number line with 2 points labeled. An arrow from point 428 to point 993 is labeled, plus question mark.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ac010379f8018e8ff9d68857e114fada75e278e3)

Let's start by adding hundreds to ${428}$ until we get as close to  ${993}$ as possible without going over ${993}$.

$\begin{align}
{428} +\purpleD{100}=528\\\\
{528} +\purpleD{100}= 628\\\\
{628} +\purpleD{100}= 728\\\\
{728} +\purpleD{100}= 828\\\\
{828} +\purpleD{100}= 928
\end{align}$

If we add $\purpleD{5 \text{ hundreds}}$, or $\purpleD{5 00}$, we reach $928$. We cannot add any more hundreds without going over ${993}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 428 to a new point 928 labeled, "plus 500"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d2aeb06d1e33abbf8d7175ffb2d875979ad8e9c0)

Next, let's add tens to $928$ until we get as close to  ${993}$ as possible without going over ${993}$.

$\begin{align}
928 +\blueD{10}=938\\\\
{938} +\blueD{10}= 948\\\\
{948} +\blueD{10}= 958\\\\
{958} +\blueD{10}= 968\\\\
{968} +\blueD{10}= 978\\\\
{978} +\blueD{10}= 988
\end{align}$

If we add $\blueD{6 \text{ tens}}$, or $\blueD{60}$, we reach $988$. We cannot add any more tens without going over ${993}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 928 to a new point 988 labeled, "plus 60"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2563d10b40ddf5de6c12792578832320e4753e73)

Finally, how many ones should we add to  $988$ to get to  ${993}?$

$\begin{align}
988+\greenD{2} &=990\\\\
990+\greenD{3} &=993
\end{align}$

We add $\greenD{5\text{ ones}}$.

![The same number line, with an arrow from point 988 to point 993 labeled, "plus 5"](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/ce12548cac83cdcd49aac2d98c349b72a9790d21)

We added $\purpleD{5 \text{ hundreds}}$, $\blueD{6 \text{ tens}}$, and $\greenD{5\text{ ones}}$ to ${428}$ to get to ${993}$.

$\purpleD{5 00}+\blueD{6 0}+\greenD{5}=\goldE{565}$

![The number line with all of the arrows shown. The original arrow from point 428 to point 993 is labeled, "plus 565." The arrows spans the arrows labeled "plus 500," "plus 60," and "plus 5."](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/6a45ea17188a69f173deb1bf3ea4b7ee8f6b5577)
